name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】白上フブキ生誕祭2024　#FBKINGDOMPROLOGUE【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ 】 [-a68MSMFuuM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki and Ookami Mio perform 'Inochi no Justitia' (命のユースティティア).
A transition sequence between song performances featuring visual effects and castle scenery.
Shirakami Fubuki performs 'GATE ~Sore wa Akatsuki no You ni~' (GATE～それは暁のように～).
scenes.song_name: GATE ~Sore wa Akatsuki no You ni~

subtitles.original: 暗闇かき込めた様な 見捨てられた街で
subtitles.english: In a forsaken town, as if filled with darkness,

subtitles.original: 命のユースティティア
subtitles.english: Inochi no Justitia

subtitles.original: 一人 孤独を唄う君を見た
subtitles.english: I saw you singing of solitude alone.

subtitles.original: 甦る過去 [kioku] に 魂霊して
subtitles.english: As memories of the past echo back,

subtitles.original: 君の腕を掴む
subtitles.english: I grab your arm.

subtitles.original: ここが 約束の地だと信じて
subtitles.english: Believing that this is the promised land.

subtitles.original: 確かな答えは 何処にも無いけれど
subtitles.english: Though a definite answer is nowhere to be found,

subtitles.original: 籠の中の小鳥は 目覚めた
subtitles.english: The little bird inside the cage has awakened.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたき無いまま 鼓動は加速して
subtitles.english: With no wings to flap, the heartbeat accelerates.

subtitles.original: 僕らこの日を
subtitles.english: We've been waiting for this day,

subtitles.original: この時を待ち続けていたんだ
subtitles.english: Waiting for this very moment.

subtitles.original: 叶わぬ祈りに 救いの両手を
subtitles.english: To the prayers that won't come true, reach out with saving hands.

subtitles.original: 生まれ変われ 命のユースティティア
subtitles.english: Be reborn, Justitia of Life.

subtitles.original: どんな風 吹いていたって
subtitles.english: No matter what kind of wind is blowing,

subtitles.original: この声は 消せやしない
subtitles.english: This voice cannot be silenced.

subtitles.original: 未来 [unmei] の僕らに 残せる物は何？
subtitles.english: What can we leave for our future selves?

subtitles.original: 宙を照らせ 一縷のユースティティア
subtitles.english: Light up the sky, a single ray of Justitia.

subtitles.original: 一秒だって 狂わせない
subtitles.english: I won't let even a single second be out of sync.

subtitles.original: 奪われた世界を さあ 取り戻せ
subtitles.english: Now, let's take back the world that was stolen.

subtitles.original: 重なり合って いつの日だって 僕らは共鳴している
subtitles.english: Overlapping together, every single day, we are resonating.

subtitles.original: 錆び付いた扉に手かざして
subtitles.english: Placing a hand on the rusted door,

subtitles.original: 再び描く現在
subtitles.english: Painting the present once more.

subtitles.original: 君の 君だけの物語 [uta] が始まる
subtitles.english: Your story, yours alone, begins.

subtitles.original: 失くした言葉と 言葉の意味を紡ぎ合わせて
subtitles.english: Spinning together the lost words and their meanings,

subtitles.original: 強く 誰より力強く 咲き誇るその音を
subtitles.english: Strongly, more powerfully than anyone, let that sound bloom in full glory.

subtitles.original: どうか 絶やさないで
subtitles.english: Please, don't ever let it die out.

subtitles.original: 僕が僕らしくあること
subtitles.english: That I stay true to myself,

subtitles.original: 君が君らしくあること
subtitles.english: That you stay true to yourself,

subtitles.original: それが 果てしない僕らの ユースティティア
subtitles.english: That is our endless Justitia.

subtitles.original: 叶わぬ祈りに 救いの両手を
subtitles.english: To the prayers that won't come true, reach out with saving hands.

subtitles.original: 生まれ変われ 命のユースティティア
subtitles.english: Be reborn, Justitia of Life.

subtitles.original: どんな風 吹いていたって
subtitles.english: No matter what kind of wind is blowing,

subtitles.original: この声は 消せやしない
subtitles.english: This voice cannot be silenced.

subtitles.original: 未来 [unmei] の僕らに 残せる物は何？
subtitles.english: What can we leave for our future selves?

subtitles.original: 宙を照らせ 一縷のユースティティア
subtitles.english: Light up the sky, a single ray of Justitia.

subtitles.original: 一秒だって 狂わせない
subtitles.english: I won't let even a single second be out of sync.

subtitles.original: 奪われた世界を さあ 取り戻せ
subtitles.english: Now, let's take back the world that was stolen.

subtitles.original: 信じ合って 騙されたって それでもそっと 光は降って
subtitles.english: Even if we trust and are deceived, even so, the light gently falls.

subtitles.original: いつかはきっと 必ずきっと
subtitles.english: Someday for sure, definitely for sure,

subtitles.original: 僕が君の心 燈すから
subtitles.english: Because I will light up your heart.

subtitles.original:
GATE～それは暁のように～
作詞・作曲・編曲：岸田
subtitles.english:
GATE ~Sore wa Akatsuki no You ni~
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Kishida

subtitles.original: 特に 何も望むことなんてない
subtitles.english: There's nothing in particular that I wish for.

subtitles.original: 身の程は 知っているさ
subtitles.english: I know my place.

subtitles.original: そんな 僕でさえも奥の方に
subtitles.english: Even in the depths of someone like me,

subtitles.original: 譲りたくない意向程度はあるらしい
subtitles.english: There seems to be at least some resolve I won't yield.

subtitles.original: 守るって 案外と難しいね
subtitles.english: Protecting something is unexpectedly difficult, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 諦めるわけじゃないけど
subtitles.english: It's not that I'm giving up, though.

subtitles.original: 蒼い 空の果て 繋がった道の行方
subtitles.english: At the end of the blue sky, the destination of the connected path.
